headline: Amundi Sees Korean Stocks Braving Short Sellers to Extend Rally
summary: (Bloomberg) -- For short sellers who are ready to take aim at South Korean stocks when a ban is lifted next week, Europe’s biggest asset manager has some advice: such a move may backfire.Most Read from BloombergThey Built a Secret Apartment in a Mall.
